title: WTB: T206 Tinker and Evers portraits (raw or low grade)
author: Woundedduck

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Tinker and Evers portraits (raw or low grade)
posts.post_content:
There have been 2 T206 Chance portraits up on these boards recently, in the condition I'm looking for for $40 each.  I was happy to be able to get one of them.  I now am hoping to pick up a T206 portrait of Tinker and Evers to finish the trio in a similar quality and price (assuming they go for around the same as the Chance).  Hopefully someone will be willing to part with what I'm looking for :) .....or if I'm way off with what I'm hoping for in terms of price, I'd appreciate the enlightening.  Thanks.

Eric


ps. I'm hoping for nice eye appeal even in the low grade as can be seen with the 2 Chances recenly posted.

I was glad to see you snagged that chance. I didn't know you were a member over here and was going to pm you on fcb to let you know about.

Kudos on the pickup and good luck on the others!

Brad
